column4: I am having problem installing apache2, php4, mysql and phpmyadmin using the source packages...

that is why i use the source package
what errors are you getting when you attempt to install php4 with apt-get install?
: sacarlson - it says that the no longer available. something like that...
just install the newer one php5 or up
i want to...but my current website uses php4

yes i have tried it... the cms wont load on php5
try it if it fails with your site then worry about it
ok what is cms?  maybe that's what we need to fix
